Title: Enhances the assisted outpatient treatment program and eliminates the expiration and repeal of Kendra's Law
Summary: Enhances the assisted outpatient treatment program; eliminates the expiration and repeal of Kendra's Law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law and the correction law, in relation to enhancing the assisted outpatient treatment program; and to amend Kendra's Law, in relation to making the provisions thereof permanent
